Title: Github Token Leak
Description: The module publishes to npm the user (that peformed a aegir-release) GitHub token.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 12.0.0 up to 12.0.7
Solution:
Upgrade to aegir version 12.0.8 or greater.

If you used this module to do a release for your project you should invalidate the GitHub tokens that were leaked.
